trans-unit.source: How to: Catch Parsing Errors (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Cómo: detectar errores (Visual Basic) de análisis | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: How to: Catch Parsing Errors (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Cómo: detectar errores (Visual Basic) de análisis

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to detect badly formed or invalid XML.
trans-unit.target: En este tema se describe cómo detectar XML no válido o mal formado.

trans-unit.source: If badly formed or invalid XML is passed to [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)], the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si se pasa XML no válido o mal formado a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)], subyacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>clase producirá una excepción.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The various methods that parse XML, such as <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, do not catch the exception; the exception can then be caught by your application.
trans-unit.target: Los diferentes métodos que analizan XML, como <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, no detectan la excepción; a continuación, se puede detectar la excepción mediante la aplicación.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot get parse errors if you use XML literals.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que no puede obtener errores de análisis si utiliza literales XML.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic compiler will catch errors of badly formed or invalid XML.
trans-unit.target: El compilador de Visual Basic detectará errores de XML no válido o mal formado.

trans-unit.source: The following code tries to parse invalid XML:
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código intenta analizar XML no válido:

trans-unit.source: When you run this code, it throws the following exception:
trans-unit.target: Cuando ejecuta este código, devuelve la siguiente excepción:

trans-unit.source: For information about the exceptions that you can expect the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to throw, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre las excepciones que puede esperar el <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, y <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para producir, consulte el <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>documentación.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
